migrants.name: Manuel
migrants.introText: Manuel has been in Ecuador for 10 months and lives with 6 of his family members. He used to work in the construction sector in Venezuela. He has a high school degree, but no other legalized accreditations or certificates.

migrants.name: Amarilis
migrants.introText: Amarilis has been in Ecuador for 9 months and lives by herself. She used to work in the wholesale and retail sector in Venezuela. She completed secondary education, and doesn’t have other legalized accreditations or certificates.

migrants.name: Fernanda
migrants.introText: Fernanda has been in Ecuador for 9 months and lives with four of her family members. She used to work in the agriculture sector in Venezuela. She has a high school degree, and doesn’t have other legalized accreditations or certificates.

migrants.name: Carlos
migrants.introText: Carlos has been in Ecuador for 10 months and lives with his partner. He used to work in the manufacturing sector in Venezuela. He completed primary education and has no other legalized accreditations or certificates.
